visits.title: Growing Up in Varna

visits.snippet: Relaxed on Varna's Black Sea beaches and explored its ancient Roman baths.

visits.title: Wild Teenage Years in Sofia

visits.title: Hidden Gems in Sofia
visits.snippet: Discovered Sofia's historic churches and vibrant markets in Bulgaria's capital.

visits.title: Exchange Year in Osseo
visits.snippet: Lived with a foster family in Osseo, Wisconsin, diving into American high school life at Osseo-Fairchild.

visits.title: Chicago: High School, College & Volleyball Beginnings
visits.snippet: Transferred to Gordon Tech, graduated high school, attended college, met my ex-wife, and started my volleyball journey at 18 - a transformative decade in the Windy City.

visits.title: Windy City Adventures in Chicago
visits.snippet: Explored Chicago's iconic skyline, deep-dish pizza, and vibrant art scene.

visits.snippet: Embraced Chicago's spring energy, visiting Paylocity and exploring the city's vibrant neighborhoods.

visits.title: Exploring Medellín's Markets
visits.snippet: Wandered through Medellín's bustling markets, soaking in the local vibes at Homecenter and beyond.

visits.title: Vibrant Streets of Medellín
visits.snippet: Dived into the colorful streets of Medellín, from Comuna 13's street art to lively salsa nights.

visits.snippet: Welcomed spring with beach days and art walks in St. Petersburg.

visits.snippet: Returned to Miami for more beach days and electric nightlife in South Beach.

visits.snippet: Explored Beirut's historic souks and vibrant nightlife along the Mediterranean coast.

visits.snippet: Explored the majestic Temple of Bacchus in Baalbek, a stunning journey into Lebanon's ancient past.

visits.snippet: Two weeks of balanced living in San Diego, combining European team meetings, beach volleyball at South Mission, and exploring local gems - all while embracing the city's famous June Gloom.

visits.title: Island Life in Honolulu
visits.snippet: Embraced island life in Honolulu with stunning beaches and lush hikes.

visits.snippet: Relaxed on Playa del Carmen's beaches and explored nearby Mayan ruins.

visits.snippet: Explored Houston's museums and vibrant food scene in a quick city stop.

visits.snippet: Soaking up Boulder's chill vibes with live music at Trident, unique tonics at Tonic Alchemy Lounge, and daily recovery at the Rec Center.

visits.snippet: Arrived in Fort Lauderdale after a Denver layover, staying with Bartek for work, beach volleyball in Deerfield, and a relaxing massage together.

urban_runner_project.name: Urban Runner
urban_runner_project.vision: A global movement for wealth redistribution — one run at a time
urban_runner_project.current_status: System architecture complete, Episode 4 executed in Bangkok
core_mechanics: Checkpoint card system with stylized game world aesthetic
Wealth redistribution through donations and tips
Gamified storytelling with photos, videos, and live updates

episode_structure.format: Each run = episode with checkpoints, fuel-ups, redistribution drops

game_systems.checkpoint_cards: stylized cards with photos, activity tags, cash overlays
game_systems.maps: Google Maps GPS timeline + game world overlay
game_systems.cutscenes: real footage with game-world render transitions

episode_4.title: Bangkok Botanical Run

side_quests.title: The Bangkok Hustle
side_quests.description: Scammed into buying overpriced herbs and honey by men posing as healers
side_quests.game_integration: Real-world scams integrated as in-game side quests

fuel_ups: Bekku Tonkatsu: Excellent meal with dessert (Total: 745 THB incl. tip)
Final sit-down at anime-themed restaurant near botanical garden
game_dynamics: Real-world scams like 'The Bangkok Hustle' integrated as side quests
Jamie joins remotely via WhatsApp for game assets and storyline
New checkpoint card system with stylized game world aesthetic
observations: Bangkok's side streets often don't connect — careful route planning required
Serendipitous signs: volleyball on TV, temples hidden in alleys
Decision-making and perseverance key — from refusing train to navigating scams
episode_4.recovery: Mission completed, grab home, planned massage session for full recovery
episode_4.assets: 9 high-quality PNG images documenting the episode

integration.globe_pins: Running routes, checkpoints, spending patterns, episode maps
integration.asset_management: Git LFS optimized for image storage
integration.community: WhatsApp group for live updates and episode recaps
